column5: I sent a pm to john from craa about the salmon in the credit and he said there hasn't been any chinooks at the ladder yet, but that can change anytime now. So before I go trolling this weekend I might get a few drifts on the notty
Sometimes the best info to post on an open forum is NONE!
agreed!

Thanks Rapala boy, but did you not pay attention to the other posts about Salmon?? Those who know when Salmon make their early runs, don't need to know from someone else, or don't need the whole world showing up at the local river, what's the point, you would do better for yourself if you keep this information secret.  I already caught a few chrome salmon, a week and a half ago, but trust me it's better keeping quiet until late September  Thanks
HUGE UPDATE, the salmon are in and they are snagging the crap out of them near lake shore road, this weekend=salmon slamming, which aslo=salmon snagging. PEACEOUT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
THERE IS NO FISH AT THE GANNY ... I THINK THEY ALL DIED OR HAVE GONE UP ... EARLY YEAR THIS YEAR
rapala boy, that was pretty rude. You'll have a lot more time to fish now and so will a few of your friends. Peaceout....
roy did you give him a vacation ???
I learned my lesson a couple years ago when i posted a salmon i caught at bronte, the next nite there was 50-100 more people there than the night before..
everyone is too nice on here...RAPALABOY, WILL YOU JUST SHUT THE HELL UP? I think thats what everyone means...
Or just Peaceoff . . .
Meh..I don't care either way. I know where the walleye will be in a few weeks.
What I'd like to know....is Rapalaboy really a girl? (as per his/her avatar info).  Inquiring minds want to know.      I'd be inclined to cut her some slack if she's actually Rapalagirl.
It's our fault, Mike. In the profile section, gender is multiple choice and there being 2 choices, SOME people have a 50% chance of getting it wrong.
If he is banned than I just won 5 dollars
I will give 5 dollars for each person who hits him with a 3/4 oz spoon when he trolling in his kayak close to the Credit rocks LOL  Some guys just do not have common sense
thats not a nice thing to say, why don't you just man up and throw one at me yourself.  I'm well aware of what posting here can do................
I'll be aniceguy...Cheques in the mail Roy...
Anyone try Rapalaboy's new trolling technique with the slip knots and the beads, LOL LOL I bet you'll be losing a whole bunch of rapalas on the bottom Rapalaboy

Then use a bit of common sense next time.   Check out the number of 'views' compared to 'replies' you have, maybe that will give you a hint at just how many people LURK this forum for nothing but information.
so you are saying that you are Rapala boy or girl or whatever
lol in that post i'm rapala boy, in this post you can think of me as whatever you like. Anyone see the fish in wilmot
This is obviously a joke.  And a bad one at that.  I think you ought to quit while you're ahead rapalagirl.
Bye Pedro..
